text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Rain pours from the sky, pounding<n>heavily against the
windows.<n>According to the forecast, it should<n>clear up in
the afternoon.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Knock, knock!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Howdy, Trainer! It's rainin' cats and<n>dogs out there—and on
a training day,<n>no less!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: On that note, I've got a favor to ask!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Wait, don't tell me she wants to run<n>in this downpour?
She'll catch a cold!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Let's make sunshine dolls together!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
My classmates were talking about<n>how much they wanted
to run outside<n>earlier.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
They were all so disappointed; it was<n>like the gloom from
the storm had<n>seeped right into the classroom.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
That's when it hit me—why not make<n>a sunshine doll? A
super big one!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
If it's super big, it'll be super<n>powerful too, right? Not even
a<n>hurricane will stand a chance!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: So hand me that curtain over there,<n>Trainer!
choice_data_list: We're making it out of a curtain?!
We're making it out of a curtain?!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
That's right! Just you wait—I'll bring<n>the sun out of hidin'
with the most<n>powerful sunshine doll you've ever<n>seen!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
I'm sure this will bring a happy smile<n>to everyones' faces!
So come on,<n>let's get started!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
While it's great that Taiki's thinking<n>about her friends,
she's trying to turn<n>the school curtains into sunshine<n>
dolls!
choice_data_list: L-let's use an even bigger cloth!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Wh-what? Bigger than a curtain?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
We request some old bed sheets<n>from the nurse's office
and sew them<n>together into a single large cloth.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: And after a bit of refashioning...

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Now all that's left is to hang it in the<n>window! So cheer up,
Trainer! You've<n>got this!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Whew! Hanging up such a big<n>sunshine doll is
back-breaking work.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
But it sure turned out great! The cute<n>smile on its face is the
best part!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A life-size sunshine doll sways in the<n>window, making the
room feel like<n>something out of a haunted house.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Yeehaaaw! Okay, lookin' good! This<n>bad boy'll blow the
rain clouds away<n>for sure—oh!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Look, Trainer! The sun's coming out!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I peer out the window to see that the<n>rain has stopped and
the sun is<n>beginning to peek through the clouds.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Amazing! Just goes to show what a<n>true Japanese magic
item and our<n>power can do, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Seeing Taiki gazing happily up at the<n>sky, I decide not to tell
her about the<n>weather forecast.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
That's some perfect training weather!<n>Now everyone can
run at full power!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Yes! I'm gonna go take a gander at<n>everybody's smiling
faces!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Oblivious to me calling her name, Taiki<n>bolts off with a skip
in her step.
